001package ca.gc.cra.radar.config;
002
003import java.nio.file.InvalidPathException;
004import java.nio.file.Path;
005import java.util.Map;
006import java.util.Objects;
007import java.util.Optional;
008
009/**
010 * Configuration for the assemble CLI pipeline.
011 *
012 * @param ioMode input mode ({@link IoMode#FILE} or {@link IoMode#KAFKA})
013 * @param kafkaBootstrap Kafka bootstrap servers when Kafka is used
014 * @param kafkaSegmentsTopic topic supplying captured segments in Kafka mode
015 * @param kafkaHttpPairsTopic topic receiving HTTP pairs in Kafka mode
016 * @param kafkaTnPairsTopic topic receiving TN3270 pairs in Kafka mode
017 * @param inputDirectory directory containing serialized segment files when in file mode
018 * @param outputDirectory root directory for assembled outputs
019 * @param httpEnabled whether HTTP reconstruction is enabled
020 * @param tnEnabled whether TN3270 reconstruction is enabled
021 * @param httpOutputDirectory optional override for HTTP output directory
022 * @param tnOutputDirectory optional override for TN3270 output directory
023 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
024 */
025public record AssembleConfig(
026    IoMode ioMode,
027    Optional<String> kafkaBootstrap,
028    String kafkaSegmentsTopic,
029    String kafkaHttpPairsTopic,
030    String kafkaTnPairsTopic,
031    Path inputDirectory,
032    Path outputDirectory,
033    boolean httpEnabled,
034    boolean tnEnabled,
035    Optional<Path> httpOutputDirectory,
036    Optional<Path> tnOutputDirectory) {
037
038  /**
039   * Normalizes assemble configuration values.
040   *
041   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
042   */
043  public AssembleConfig {
044    ioMode = Objects.requireNonNullElse(ioMode, IoMode.FILE);
045    Optional<String> bootstrap = kafkaBootstrap == null ? Optional.empty() : kafkaBootstrap;
046    kafkaBootstrap = bootstrap.map(String::trim).filter(s -> !s.isEmpty());
047    kafkaHttpPairsTopic = sanitizeTopic(kafkaHttpPairsTopic, "kafkaHttpPairsTopic");
048    kafkaTnPairsTopic = sanitizeTopic(kafkaTnPairsTopic, "kafkaTnPairsTopic");
049    Objects.requireNonNull(inputDirectory, "inputDirectory");
050    Objects.requireNonNull(outputDirectory, "outputDirectory");
051    httpOutputDirectory = sanitizeOptional(httpOutputDirectory);
052    tnOutputDirectory = sanitizeOptional(tnOutputDirectory);
053
054    if (!httpEnabled && !tnEnabled) {
055      throw new IllegalArgumentException("At least one protocol must be enabled");
056    }
057    if (ioMode == IoMode.KAFKA && kafkaBootstrap.isEmpty()) {
058      throw new IllegalArgumentException("kafkaBootstrap is required when ioMode=KAFKA");
059    }
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Returns a baseline configuration pointing at local directories.
064   *
065   * @return default assemble configuration
066   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
067   */
068  public static AssembleConfig defaults() {
069    return new AssembleConfig(
070        IoMode.FILE,
071        Optional.empty(),
072        "radar.segments",
073        "radar.http.pairs",
074        "radar.tn3270.pairs",
075        Path.of("./cap-out"),
076        Path.of("./pairs-out"),
077        true,
078        false,
079        Optional.empty(),
080        Optional.empty());
081  }
082
083  /**
084   * Creates a configuration instance from CLI-style key/value pairs.
085   *
086   * @param options key/value pairs such as {@code in}, {@code out}, {@code kafkaBootstrap}
087   * @return populated configuration
088   * @throws IllegalArgumentException when values are invalid or required settings are missing
089   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
090   */
091  public static AssembleConfig fromMap(Map<String, String> options) {
092    AssembleConfig defaults = defaults();
093    IoMode ioMode = parseIoMode(options.get("ioMode"), defaults.ioMode());
094    Optional<String> kafkaBootstrap = optionalString(options.get("kafkaBootstrap"));
095
096    Path input = defaults.inputDirectory();
097    String kafkaSegmentsTopic = defaults.kafkaSegmentsTopic();
098    String inRaw = firstNonBlank(options.get("in"), options.get("segments"));
099    if (inRaw != null && !inRaw.isBlank()) {
100      if (inRaw.startsWith("kafka:")) {
101        ioMode = IoMode.KAFKA;
102        kafkaSegmentsTopic = sanitizeTopic(inRaw.substring("kafka:".length()), "kafkaSegmentsTopic");
103      } else {
104        input = resolvePath(inRaw);
105      }
106    }
107    String segmentsTopicOverride = optionalString(options.get("kafkaSegmentsTopic"))
108        .orElse(kafkaSegmentsTopic);
109    kafkaSegmentsTopic = segmentsTopicOverride;
110
111    Path output = resolvePath(
112        firstNonBlank(options.get("out"), options.get("--out"), defaults.outputDirectory().toString()));
113    boolean httpEnabled = parseBoolean(options.get("httpEnabled"), true);
114    boolean tnEnabled = parseBoolean(options.get("tnEnabled"), false);
115
116    Optional<Path> httpOut = optionalPath(firstNonBlank(options.get("httpOut"), options.get("--httpOut")));
117    Optional<Path> tnOut = optionalPath(firstNonBlank(options.get("tnOut"), options.get("--tnOut")));
118
119    String kafkaHttpPairsTopic = optionalString(options.get("kafkaHttpPairsTopic"))
120        .orElse(defaults.kafkaHttpPairsTopic());
121    String kafkaTnPairsTopic = optionalString(options.get("kafkaTnPairsTopic"))
122        .orElse(defaults.kafkaTnPairsTopic());
123
124    if (!httpEnabled && !tnEnabled) {
125      throw new IllegalArgumentException("At least one protocol must be enabled");
126    }
127
128    if (ioMode == IoMode.KAFKA && kafkaBootstrap.isEmpty()) {
129      throw new IllegalArgumentException("kafkaBootstrap is required for KAFKA ioMode");
130    }
131
132    return new AssembleConfig(
133        ioMode,
134        kafkaBootstrap,
135        kafkaSegmentsTopic,
136        kafkaHttpPairsTopic,
137        kafkaTnPairsTopic,
138        input,
139        output,
140        httpEnabled,
141        tnEnabled,
142        httpOut,
143        tnOut);
144  }
145
146  /**
147   * Resolves the effective HTTP output directory, defaulting under {@link #outputDirectory}.
148   *
149   * @return directory for HTTP output
150   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
151   */
152  public Path effectiveHttpOut() {
153    return httpOutputDirectory.orElseGet(() -> outputDirectory.resolve("http"));
154  }
155
156  /**
157   * Resolves the effective TN3270 output directory, defaulting under {@link #outputDirectory}.
158   *
159   * @return directory for TN3270 output
160   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
161   */
162  public Path effectiveTnOut() {
163    return tnOutputDirectory.orElseGet(() -> outputDirectory.resolve("tn3270"));
164  }
165
166  private static boolean parseBoolean(String value, boolean defaultValue) {
167    if (value == null) {
168      return defaultValue;
169    }
170    return Boolean.parseBoolean(value);
171  }
172
173  private static Path resolvePath(String value) {
174    if (value == null || value.isBlank()) {
175      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Path value must not be blank");
176    }
177    try {
178      return Path.of(value);
179    } catch (InvalidPathException ex) {
180      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid path: " + value, ex);
181    }
182  }
183
184  private static String firstNonBlank(String... values) {
185    for (String value : values) {
186      if (value != null && !value.isBlank()) {
187        return value;
188      }
189    }
190    return values.length == 0 ? "" : values[values.length - 1];
191  }
192
193  private static Optional<Path> optionalPath(String value) {
194    if (value == null || value.isBlank()) {
195      return Optional.empty();
196    }
197    return Optional.of(resolvePath(value));
198  }
199
200  private static Optional<Path> sanitizeOptional(Optional<Path> candidate) {
201    if (candidate == null) {
202      return Optional.empty();
203    }
204    return candidate.map(Path::normalize);
205  }
206
207  private static Optional<String> optionalString(String value) {
208    if (value == null) {
209      return Optional.empty();
210    }
211    String trimmed = value.trim();
212    return trimmed.isEmpty() ? Optional.empty() : Optional.of(trimmed);
213  }
214
215  private static IoMode parseIoMode(String value, IoMode fallback) {
216    if (value == null || value.isBlank()) {
217      return fallback;
218    }
219    return IoMode.fromString(value);
220  }
221
222  private static String sanitizeTopic(String topic, String name) {
223    if (topic == null) {
224      throw new IllegalArgumentException(name + " must not be null");
225    }
226    String trimmed = topic.trim();
227    if (trimmed.isEmpty()) {
228      throw new IllegalArgumentException(name + " must not be blank");
229    }
230    return trimmed;
231  }
232}
